snippet.title: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood | Teaser Trailer | Devespresso Games
snippet.description:
Scarlet awakens in the strange land of Glome after getting tossed by a tornado. Through a series of unfortunate events, she finds herself in charge of leading a hapless Munchkin troupe through the Wicked Wood to safety. One problem - the cantankerous Black Witch, LeFaba, has a habit of incinerating would-be travelers that detour through her forest. Scarlet may be woefully outmatched, but a recursion hex has her reliving the same day. Can our fledgling pathfinder take up the mantle of the Red Witch and summon the moxie to overcome the disaster that awaits her at every turn?

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1141120/Scarlet_Hood_and_the_Wicked_Wood/

Press Kit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uxMQwWdsEWaup97pc3QcG_R9kGY-KuOB?usp=sharing

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DevespressoG

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/devespresso

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/devespresso/
